00020 #include <sys/resource.h>

00023 #ifndef RLIMIT_DATA_DEFAULT
00024 #define RLIMIT_DATA_DEFAULT 16777216    /* assume 16MB by default */
00025 #endif
00026 
00027 #ifndef EXTERN
00028 #   ifdef __cplusplus
00029 #       define EXTERN extern "C"
00030 #   else
00031 #       define EXTERN extern
00032 #   endif
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 EXTERN long getSoftDataLimit();
00036 
00037 long
00038 getSoftDataLimit()
00039 {
00040 #if HAVE_SYS_RESOURCE_H == 1 && HAVE_GETRLIMIT == 1 && defined(RLIMIT_DATA)
00041     struct rlimit rl;
00042     long result;
00043 
00044     result = (long) getrlimit(RLIMIT_DATA, &rl);
00045     if (result != 0 || rl.rlim_cur == RLIM_INFINITY)
00046         return(RLIMIT_DATA_DEFAULT);
00047     else
00048         return(rl.rlim_cur);
00049 #else
00050     return(RLIMIT_DATA_DEFAULT);
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 } /* end of getSoftDataLimit */
